IF(WIN)
	DKDEPEND(python)
	DKDEPEND(vc2019)
ENDIF()
IF(LINUX)
	DKDEPEND(libboost1.58-tools-dev)
ENDIF()
IF(ANDROID OR IPHONE OR IPHONESIMULATOR)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()
IF(WIN32)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/build-4.2.0/b2.exe)
	ENDIF()
ENDIF()
IF(WIN)
ENDIF()
IF(MAC)
ENDIF()
IF(LINUX)
ENDIF()
IF(STATIC)
IF(Boost_Atomic)
ENDIF()
IF(Boost_Chrono)
ENDIF()
IF(Boost_DateTime)
ENDIF()
IF(Boost_Filesystem)
ENDIF()
IF(Boost_Random)
ENDIF()
IF(Boost_System)
ENDIF()
IF(Boost_Thread)
ENDIF()
IF(WIN_32)
ENDIF()
IF(WIN_64)
ENDIF()
ENDIF(STATIC)
IF(DYNAMIC)
IF(Boost_Filesystem)
ENDIF()
IF(Boost_System)
ENDIF()
IF(WIN_32)
ENDIF()
ENDIF(DYNAMIC)
